Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory68.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "This area is bigger than I thought, now that we've got a map from Foreman...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's also divided into clearly-defined zones. I wonder how many mechanoids have gathered here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'My initial estimation is over a thousand of them. After all, maintaining a hologram of this scale must involve an enormous amount of recon drones.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Who organizes this?', 3: '8', 4: "Can't believe there's so many mechanoid here.", 5: '10'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'It could be Foreman, it could be others, but from my experience, a convention of this nature is usually run collectively by the fans.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Foreman did say they all enjoy Ghost Expert here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Even with the results from our database, it's still difficult to determine what this Ghost Expert is..."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Anyway, we should definitely look into a group this size. We might just get our hands on some useful intel.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanoid A', 3: 'Ugh, why is the first trial so damn difficult already? What the hell?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mechanoid B', 3: "We can always give it another go later. Let's try the other trials first to liven things up.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mechanoid A', 3: "I'm gonna give that East General a taste of my fist after the event's over. Just you wait!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Those mechanoids...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Looks like they're contestants who did the trial before us. Should we ask them how it went, Commandant?", 4: '2'}
{2: "That's not necessary.", 3: '16', 4: "Let's ask them.", 5: '17'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Copy. Then let's keep going.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Understood.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lucia walks up to the two mechanoids as you instructed and greets them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanoid A', 3: 'Babylonia... Nah, never heard of it. What can I do for you?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "We're also participants in this competition. We're just wondering if you can tell us a little bit about the content of the trial?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mechanoid A', 3: "Won't hurt to tell you what it is, I suppose. Basically, it's a game of riddles.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Are they riddles that challenge our knowledge base?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mechanoid A', 3: "It's a challenge on how well you know your companions. Speaking of which—how the hell did you not notice that guy's a fake?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mechanoid B', 3: 'Hey, stop hitting me!', 4: '3'}
{3: 'Halfway through your conversation, one of the mechanoids starts smacking the other one, and you feel like this is as much information as you can get from them.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'How well we know our companions, is it...?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory68.jpg'}
{2: 'East General', 3: "So you're the Babylonian contestants Foreman mentioned, aren't you? I'm East General, the guardian of the Eastern trial!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Did Foreman mention us specifically?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'East General', 3: "This ghost-hunting event is for fun, after all. We wouldn't want bad eggs among us, would we?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Despite how silly this event is, this East General in front of you seems to be quite a knowledgeable individual.'}
{2: 'East General', 3: 'Regardless, I should provide you with a little more information before you begin.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'East General', 3: 'Apart from the Northern trial, all the other trials only permit one participant each time, and those who have taken part in a previous trial cannot join another one.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'East General', 3: "Considering that you're a group of Constructs with a commandant, I'll allow your commandant to assist you through your comms.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thanks.', 3: '35', 4: "Wouldn't that be unfair?", 5: '36'}
{2: 'East General', 3: 'Sure.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'East General', 3: "Given that you Constructs only work well with a commandant and that you're all new to this... Consider this a newcomer gift.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Newcomers... So you've hosted this event here multiple times...", 4: '2'}

{1: '1', 2: 'East General', 3: 'Now, onto the instruction of the trial itself. As contestants, you must know that ghosts are inclined to disguise themselves as others to trick innocent people.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'East General', 3: "But you certainly won't be fooled by such trickery as outstanding Taoists yourselves! Therefore, I, East General, shall test your perception!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'East General', 3: 'So, send in the one who knows your group best!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The one who knows us best... Commandant, who should we send?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'How about me?', 3: '42', 4: 'Any one of you will do, right?', 5: '5002'}
{2: 'East General', 3: 'Better keep the human out of this, I reckon. Unexpected dangers lurk within!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Right. Any one of us would easily pass this trial.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'In that case... can I do it?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As you wrestle with deciding who to send in, Liv raises her hand, her cheeks slightly blushing.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's always been Lucia or Lee who leads the charge in the past, therefore... if I could...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "And I've always been watching over everyone on the battlefield! That's why I won't fail when it comes to knowing my companions!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I don't see why not, Commandant. Let's send Liv in.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'East General', 3: 'Very well... Let the trial begin! Scene change!', 4: '1'}
